com.octo.android.robospice.request.reporter
Class DefaultRequestProgressReporter

java.lang.Object
  com.octo.android.robospice.request.reporter.DefaultRequestProgressReporter
All Implemented Interfaces:
RequestProgressReporter
public class DefaultRequestProgressReporter
extends Object
implements RequestProgressReporter

Default implementation of RequestProgressReporter. It will notify listeners on the ui thread.

Author:
Andrew Clark

notifyListenersOfRequestNotFound

public <T> void notifyListenersOfRequestNotFound(CachedSpiceRequest<T> request,
                                                 Set<RequestListener<?>> listRequestListener)
Description copied from interface: RequestProgressReporter
Notify listeners that no pending request is found (used by SpiceManager.addListenerIfPending(Class, Object, com.octo.android.robospice.request.listener.PendingRequestListener) .

Specified by:
notifyListenersOfRequestNotFound in interface RequestProgressReporter
Parameters:
request - a given request.
listRequestListener - a set of RequestListener. Only instances of PendingRequestListener will be notified of the event.

Description copied from interface: RequestProgressReporter
Notify listeners that a penging request has been found. This callback is invoked when a request is aggregated to a pending request.

Specified by:
notifyListenersOfRequestAdded in interface RequestProgressReporter
Parameters:
request - a given request.
listeners - a set of RequestListener.
